title: Template Tests
text: Internal repository store tests utilize datasets scda package. Repository tests TLG sample templates verify functionality correct output. Template tests migrated tern package February 2023.

title: Template Tests
text: scda.test package several dependencies required run tests within package. installing scda.test repository, please ensure latest versions tern, scda, scda.2022 packages installed. Installation instructions provided links: tern scda scda.2022

title: Template Tests
text: repository internal must cloned installed manually GitHub. Clone repository repository can downloaded directly github.com site archive (see GitHub tutorial cloning learn ). Alternatively, Git command line tools offer functionality, without need manual downloading unpacking archive, require authenticate GitHub. can authenticate using key pair Personal Access Token (PAT). Please refer GitHub tutorials connecting GitHub using SSH creating using PAT. Using PAT: Input Git Bash console, PowerShell, Linux shell: Using SSH: set properly, repository ready cloned executing: creates subdirectory scda.test containing cloned repository. Build install Native R tools provide quick way install package. Alternatively, build package create archive run PowerShell Linux shell:
code: $ git clone https://github.com/insightsengineering/scda.test.git Username: your_username_goes_here Password: your_token_goes_here git clone https://github.com/insightsengineering/scda.test.git R CMD build scda.test
